scripts.start: SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_GIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_VERSION=$npm_package_version SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_BUILD_DATE=$(date) snowpack dev
scripts.build: SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_GIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_VERSION=$npm_package_version SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_BUILD_DATE=$(date) snowpack build
scripts.predeploy: npm run lint && npm run build
